note_text: Medical thoracoscopy for large right pleural effusion with multiple parietal and visceral pleural nodules, pleural biopsies, talc slurry pleurodesis, and chest tube placement.

notes: Procedure: Medical thoracoscopy with talc pleurodesis.
Code 32650 includes the surgical thoracoscopy and pleurodesis.
Diagnostic inspection and biopsies are typically bundled into the surgical code 32650.

per_code.reasoning: Medical thoracoscopy with pleural biopsies and talc pleurodesis is captured by a single thoracoscopic pleurodesis code; diagnostic inspection and chest tube placement are inherent.

dropped_codes.reason: Chemical pleurodesis via chest tube (32560) is bundled into thoracoscopic pleurodesis 32650 when performed on the same side.
Tube thoracostomy (32551) is a separate-procedure code and not reported when it is the access for thoracoscopic pleurodesis.
Diagnostic thoracoscopy (32601) is included in the more extensive thoracoscopic pleurodesis 32650.

coding_review.note_rationale: Consolidated all thoracoscopic work into 32650 to avoid double-coding pleurodesis and chest tube insertion.

note_text: Flexible bronchoscopy with serial balloon dilation of post-intubation tracheal stenosis from ~40% to ~75% patency.

notes: Procedure: Bronchoscopic tracheal dilation.
Code 31630 covers dilation of the trachea/bronchi.
Diagnostic bronchoscopy (31622) is bundled.

per_code.reasoning: Serial balloon dilation of post-intubation tracheal stenosis is the primary service and is appropriately coded with 31630.

dropped_codes.reason: Diagnostic bronchoscopy (31622) is bundled when bronchial dilation 31630 is performed in the same session.

coding_review.note_rationale: Only bronchial dilation required a CPT code; the diagnostic inspection is included in 31630.

note_text: Photodynamic therapy light application to an early-stage endobronchial squamous cell carcinoma in the left mainstem bronchus after prior Photofrin administration.

notes: Procedure: Photodynamic therapy (light application).
Code 31641 captures tumor destruction/therapy by any method (including PDT).
Only one unit of 31641 is reported per session regardless of the number of sites treated with PDT.

per_code.reasoning: Photodynamic therapy light activation for an endobronchial squamous cell carcinoma represents tumor destruction/stenosis relief and is captured by 31641.

coding_review.note_rationale: No separate diagnostic or additional bronchoscopic procedures beyond the photodynamic therapy were documented.

note_text: Flexible bronchoscopy under GA with retrieval of three Zephyr endobronchial valves from the right upper lobe and clearance of distal mucus plugging.

notes: Procedure: Removal of endobronchial valves.
Code 31648 covers removal of valves from the initial lobe (RUL).
Even though 3 valves were removed, they are from the same lobe, so 31648 x1 is appropriate.

per_code.reasoning: The procedure describes retrieval of existing Zephyr valves from the right upper lobe; 31648 is the specific code for bronchial valve removal and includes bronchoscopic inspection and suctioning.

dropped_codes.reason: Diagnostic bronchoscopy is inherent to valve removal and is not separately reported absent a distinct diagnostic session.
31647 describes bronchial valve placement, not removal; the documentation clearly describes valve retrieval.

coding_review.note_rationale: Simplified coding to the dedicated valve removal code 31648, which best matches the documented work.

note_text: Flexible bronchoscopy via tracheostomy for Dumon stent surveillance with extensive suctioning and clearance of thick secretions from the left mainstem stent lumen.

notes: Procedure: Stent surveillance with extensive suctioning.
Changed 31622 (Diagnostic) to 31645 (Therapeutic aspiration) because 'extensive suctioning and clearance of thick secretions' supports therapeutic work beyond simple inspection.

changes: Upgraded CPT from 31622 to 31645 based on 'extensive suctioning'.

per_code.reasoning: Surveillance bronchoscopy through a tracheostomy for Dumon stent inspection with suctioning of secretions fits a diagnostic bronchoscopy; no stent placement, removal, or dilation is documented.

coding_review.note_rationale: Stent surveillance and secretion clearance are integral to diagnostic bronchoscopy and do not require separate CPT codes.

note_text: Bronchoscopy with REBUS-guided transbronchial cryobiopsy of the right lower lobe (5 samples) for ILD workup using an Arndt blocker for bleeding control.

notes: Procedure: Transbronchial cryobiopsy with Radial EBUS.
Code 31628 (TBLB) captures the parenchymal biopsy.
Code +31654 captures the Radial EBUS guidance.
Arndt blocker use is bundled.

per_code.description: Bronchoscopy with transbronchial lung biopsy, single lobe
per_code.reasoning: Transbronchial cryobiopsy of the right lower lobe with multiple samples is coded as a single-lobe transbronchial lung biopsy.

per_code.description: Radial EBUS for peripheral lesion(s) during bronchoscopy (add-on)
per_code.reasoning: REBUS (radial EBUS) guidance for peripheral sampling is appropriately captured by add-on code +31654.

dropped_codes.reason: Diagnostic bronchoscopy 31622 is bundled when a more extensive transbronchial lung biopsy service (31628) is performed in the same session.

coding_review.note_rationale: Final coding reflects both the transbronchial lung cryobiopsy and the documented radial EBUS guidance without separately billing the diagnostic component.

note_text: Bedside talc slurry pleurodesis via existing large-bore chest tube for right malignant pleural effusion with position changes for talc distribution.

notes: Procedure: Bedside chemical pleurodesis via existing tube.
Code 32560 accurately describes instillation of a pleurodesis agent via chest tube.

per_code.reasoning: Talc slurry instilled through an existing large-bore chest tube for malignant effusion is exactly described by 32560.

dropped_codes.reason: Tube thoracostomy (32551) requires new chest tube placement; the note specifies pleurodesis through an existing tube with no new insertion.

coding_review.note_rationale: Only chemical pleurodesis was performed at this encounter; chest tube management is included in 32560.

note_text: Emergency bedside bronchoscopy for massive hemoptysis localizing bleeding to the left upper lobe and lingula with iced saline, topical epinephrine, tranexamic acid, and Fogarty balloon tamponade.

notes: Procedure: Hemoptysis control with balloon tamponade.
Changed 31622 to 31634. While 31634 is often for Chartis, its definition 'balloon occlusion... and documentation' applies to balloon tamponade for hemorrhage control.
31634 is the specific code for balloon occlusion.

changes: Replaced 31622 with 31634 (Balloon Occlusion) for hemoptysis tamponade.

per_code.reasoning: Emergency bedside bronchoscopy to localize bleeding with saline, topical vasoconstrictors, tranexamic acid, and balloon tamponade is captured as a diagnostic bronchoscopy with hemostatic maneuvers included.

coding_review.note_rationale: There is no distinct tumor ablation, stent placement, or biopsy to justify additional bronchoscopy codes beyond 31622.

note_text: Complex hybrid-OR case with rigid bronchoscopy for right mainstem tumor debulking, balloon dilation, metallic stent placement, extensive suctioning of post-obstructive secretions, pericardial window by CT surgery, and right PleurX catheter placement.

notes: Procedure: Rigid bronchoscopy with tumor debulking, stent (RMS), and IPC.
31636: Bronchial Stent (Right Mainstem is bronchial, not tracheal 31631).
31641: Tumor debulking/destruction.
32550: PleurX catheter.
Replaced 31631 (Tracheal) with 31636 (Bronchial) + 31641.

per_code.reasoning: Rigid bronchoscopy with tumor debulking, balloon dilation, and metallic stent placement in the right mainstem bronchus is best represented by 31631; dilation of the same segment is inherent.

per_code.description: Insertion of indwelling tunneled pleural catheter
per_code.reasoning: Placement of a right PleurX catheter is coded with 32550.

dropped_codes.reason: Diagnostic bronchoscopy is bundled when therapeutic stent placement 31631 is performed in the same session.
Balloon dilation in the same mainstem segment as stent placement is bundled into 31631 under the stent-dilation-same-segment rule.

coding_review.note_rationale: Final coding focuses on the major airway stent procedure and separate tunneled pleural catheter placement; tumor debulking and dilation are integral to stent placement.

note_text: Diagnostic bronchoscopy with bronchoalveolar lavage of the left lower lobe for pneumonia evaluation; no endobronchial lesions seen.

notes: Procedure: Diagnostic BAL.
Code 31624 covers bronchoscopy with BAL.
31622 is bundled.

per_code.reasoning: Diagnostic bronchoscopy with BAL of the left lower lobe for pneumonia evaluation is appropriately coded with 31624.

dropped_codes.reason: 31624 already includes the diagnostic bronchoscopy work; 31622 should not be reported in addition for the same session.

coding_review.note_rationale: No biopsies, EBUS, or stents were documented; the only distinct service is diagnostic BAL.
